tagLine: Delivering quality service with a laugh
blurb: Adaptable goofball with a zany mix of customer service and archival management skills. Great at making things run smoothly and hitting targets while cracking jokes. Fluent in English and French, with a knack for making people smile.

jobs.title: Chief Guest Happiness Officer
tasks: Spread cheer and ensure guests have a laugh-tastic stay.
Kept guest areas spick-and-span with a dose of humour.

jobs.title: Client Chuckles Coordinator
tasks: Supported advertisers on a leading social media platform, making them laugh.
Acted as a go-between for the company and clients, resolving issues with a smile.
Recognised for top-notch customer service and team mirth.

jobs.title: Digital Doodle Dynamo
tasks: Grew an Instagram following of 7,000+ through whimsical digital artwork.
Showed off superb customer engagement and project jester skills.

jobs.title: Office Wizard of Whimsy
tasks: Managed office hijinks in a bustling newsroom.
Worked with accounting, design, marketing, conferences, and editorial teams, spreading cheer.
Provided accurate and amusing transcription services.

jobs.title: Temporary Giggle Secretary
tasks: Supported various companies with a variety of operational tasks and jokes.
Managed administrative duties with a humorous touch.

jobs.title: Customer Support Comedian
tasks: Led educational sales and supported language learners with puns and wordplay.

jobs.title: Fashion Funnyman
tasks: Managed sales and provided stylish customer service with a smile.
Hit sales targets and assisted customers with their fashion choices, adding a humorous twist.

jobs.title: Archival Antics Assistant
tasks: Managed, digitized, and organized archive documents, adding a dash of humour to history.

education.subject: Humour Studies and Archival Jokes
education.thesis: Laughing Through the Archives: A Study of Historical Humour.
